text: Iwo amakufunsa iwe za zinthu zimene zili zololedwa kwa iwo. Nena: “Zinthu zonse zimene ndi zabwino ndi zololedwa kwa inu ndiponso zinthu zimene mwaphunzitsa, mbalame ndi nyama zosaka kuti zizigwira, kuziphunzitsa monga momwe Mulungu adakuphunzitsirani. Motero idyani zimene izo zakugwirirani koma tchulani dzina la Mulungu pa izo ndipo opani Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wachangu powerengera.”
